name: Micro Quest!
description:
Micro Quest!

"The Knight" was given the mission to eliminate all the slimes that are infesting the tower.

"The Knight" also missed the sunset a lot.

- - -

Game made for the WASM-4 Game Jam.

Made with WASM-4 and Nelua programming language.

Micro Quest is an open source game!!

Controls:

  • Arrows/D-pad moves
  • X/Button 1 attacks.
